message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a deal. I'm offering it to you for $12000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking to save some money, but I need to make sure I get a good deal too. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $11800. It's a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $11500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.

I understand you're trying to save more, Bob, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering at $12200. This is as low as I can go, and I think it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you.
